string-array.name: newstuff
string-array.item: Reworked icon requests code. Thanks to Steve Albright.
Buttons in about section are working.
Implemented Chrome Custom Tabs in About section.
Created alt layout for About section.
Added option to enable or disable drawer header. (In Code).
Fixed apps names length in requests section.

string-array.name: improvements
string-array.item: Back to advice dialogs in Requests and Apply sections.
Some renamed stuff for better understanding.
